hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) delivered a khutbah and said: 'When any one of you wants to go to Jumu'ah, let him perform ghusl

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ حَضِّ الإِمَامِ فِي خُطْبَتِهِ عَلَى الْغُسْلِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Imam Urging Ghusl During His Khutbah On Friday
